metadata.title: CVE-2018-10199 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In versions of mruby up to and including 1.4.0, a use-after-freevulnerability exists in src/io.c::File#initilialize_copy(). An attackerthat can cause Ruby code to be run can possibly use this to executearbitrary code.

criterions.comment: mruby package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
